ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:10:41 [Issue ID 4000-84884] urn:comicvine:4000-84884 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 12:48:56. [Issue ID 104841]
ComicInfo.Summary: Heroes glide through the sky on lightning bolts and fire. Flamboyant villains attempt daring daylight robberies. God-like alien creatures clash in epic battles over the nighttime sky. And on the dirty city streets below, Homicide Detective Christian Walker does his job. Walker is teamed up with spunky rookie Detective Deena Pilgrim to investigate murders specific to superhero cases. Investigations that take them from the seediest underbelly a city has to offer, to the gleaming towers that are home to immortal beings. It's cops-and-capes like you have NEVER seen them in the surprise hit from super- hot comic writer and EISNER award-winning team of Brian Michael Bendis (Ultimate Spider-Man, Daredevil, Alias) and full- color, art deco comic artist Mike Avon Oeming (Bluntman & Chronic, Hammer of the Gods). The Supergroup Saga Explosive Conclusion! One of the greatest supergroups in the world has been virtually destroyed in front of the world. But the fallout for Walker and Pilgrim is much more personal than they ever thought it would be. An issue that will change Powers forever!
ComicInfo.Title: Supergroup (Part 6)
